about.imageAlt: Kids learning and playing at Bachpan Vidyalay
about.description1: A warm place where early curiosity is welcomed, imaginations are celebrated, and every child feels seen.
about.description2: We blend playful exploration with caring guidance so little learners grow confident, kind, and excited about school.

principal.title: A Message from Our Principal
principal.message: Welcome to the Bachpan Vidyalay family — where every child’s curiosity is welcomed, their uniqueness celebrated, and learning is a joyful journey.
principal.name: Mrs. Anjali Mehta
principal.commitment: Committed to nurturing curious, confident learners.

campusLife.title: Campus Life at Bachpan Vidyalay
campusLife.description: A joyful, safe, and nurturing environment where every child learns, plays, and explores their passions.

sports.title: Sports & Fitness
sports.desc: Kids enjoy cricket, football, yoga, and fun relays, learning teamwork, coordination, and fitness habits early on.

creativeArts.title: Creative Arts
creativeArts.desc: Children explore painting, music, dance, and drama, enhancing creativity, confidence, and expression in a fun environment.

stem.title: STEM & Science
stem.desc: Hands-on experiments, coding, and discovery-based learning spark curiosity and critical thinking in young minds.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Exploration
outdoor.desc: Nature walks, gardening, and playground adventures help children connect with the environment and develop curiosity.

reading.title: Reading & Literacy
reading.desc: Storytime, interactive reading, and language games cultivate literacy skills and a lifelong love for books.

music.title: Music & Performance
music.desc: Singing, rhythm, and performance activities help children build confidence, coordination, and joy in creative expression.

prePrimary.title: Pre-Primary
prePrimary.desc: (LKG & UKG) – Play-based learning to build foundational skills in a fun, creative setting.

primary.title: Primary School
primary.desc: (Grades 1–5) – Building strong academic foundations with a focus on core subjects and exploration.

middle.title: Middle School
middle.desc: (Grades 6–8) – Preparing students for future challenges with critical thinking and in-depth learning.

gallery.title: Glimpses of Our World
gallery.description: Explore the vibrant moments that make our school a special place to learn and grow.

cards.title: Experienced Teachers

cards.title: Holistic Development

cards.title: Safe & Secure Campus
cards.desc: A calm, secure environment and well-defined routines so parents feel reassured every day.
